review: We have researched about best clinics for fertility related treatment and came across garbha gudi ** *** ** *** **** ** ********** Since our first visit Dr. Aparna mam has been supportive and patient with all our questions. She has spent good amount of time with us in all our visits and explained each step in detail so that we felt confident in the treatment plans. She never rushed us into any treatment without the necessity, which is very rare quality to find in doctors these days.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
im very happy with Doctor Aparna ma'am, she explained to us in detail and gave the right information which is helpful for Us.

and also the nurse and front office was very polite and helpfull

*** ****** *** ** *** **** *** *** *** We are thankful to her in our life time. We had been trying for our second baby for more than 3 years and we took treatment from many other doctors. But nothing helped us. Finally we reached Aparna mam in the Garbagudi hospital Kalyan Nagar and she was able to find the problem in us and able to treat within 2 months. Finally the result has come, now my wife is carrying and it’s 4th month. All the early pregnancy scans and NT scan reports of our baby are good. The only god saved and helped in our life is Aparna mam. I don’t know more words to thank her but definitely we will meet her with our new born baby. We wish she should live 100 years and help many couples like us to becoming parents. Thank you.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We love Garbhagudi especially Dr Aparna Mam because she helped us lot to get our life fulfilled. We got good results we thank Aparna Mam and we thank entire staff

Especially front office and sisters helped us lot
